text: 13.2: Dan 7.4-6; VB 12.4; 12.9; 16.10Gu mba ntige gari ruaŋruaŋgi sɨk, ana ruaŋruaŋgi pusi bakɨme fara muuŋgi. Mba sɨk, mbe kha zɨn ana rɨgi, repat. Ana ŋkari, bear ŋkari fara muuŋgi. Ana kamthooŋ, raion kamthooŋ fara muuŋgi. Mba kuruk won ŋkasŋkar mba ruaŋruaŋgi sɨga nɨɨŋgi. Ana ana muuŋgim, ana ara fara muuŋgiap, ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan kim, ana ŋkasŋka bakɨmen ana nɨɨŋgi.
